alert.note: Alert for Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 10:57PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...High Water On The Fortymile River Through Monday... The Fortymile River is rising rapidly tonight, with the river continuing to rise through Sunday. Between one half inch and one inch of rain fell over the Fortymile Country on Saturday causing these sharp river rises. The Fortymile upstream of Chicken will crest early on Sunday, and the Fortymile near O`Brien Creek will crest on Sunday night. Water will cover gravel bars and there will be lots of logs and other debris coming down the river. People with equipment and valuables on gravel bars and along the bank should prepare for rapid river rises and move their valuables to higher ground above the river bank.

area.areaDesc: Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country
